25
26namespace vsip
27{
28namespace impl
29{
30
31template <dimension_type Dim>
32const_Vector<processor_type>
33Subset_map<Dim>::processor_set() const
34{
35  Vector<processor_type> pset(this->num_processors());
36
37  for (index_type i=0; i<this->num_processors(); ++i)
38    pset.put(i, this->pvec_[i]);
39
40  return pset;
41}
42
43} // namespace vsip::impl
44} // namespace vsip
45
46#endif // VSIP_CORE_PARALLEL_SUBSET_MAP_HPP
